## Analysis approach

```{r}
chocolate <- chocolate %>%
  mutate(lecithin = case_when(
    grepl("L", ingredients) ~ 1,
    T ~ 0
  ),
  vanilla = case_when(
    grepl("V", ingredients) ~ 1,
    T ~ 0
  ),
  cocoa = case_when(
    grepl("C", ingredients) ~ 1,
    T ~ 0
  ),
  salt = case_when(
    grepl("Sa", ingredients) ~ 1,
    T ~ 0
  )
  )
```

```{r}
chocolate %>%
  filter(grepl("*", ingredients)) %>%
  select(ingredients)
```

```{r}
chocolate %>%
  drop_na(
    ingredients
  )
```
